    internalMakeQuestion(double positionalDifference, Comparator<Anime> comparator, String prompt, String difficulty, String type)
    Algorithm for generating question based on difficulty Difficulty is based on the positionalDifference of the list For example if we have a list of 100 anime listed by rank We pick a random number then by random chance move forward/backward by positionalDifference% of the list The two anime will then be selected for making question object

    • internalMakeQuestion

      public Question internalMakeQuestion(double positionalDifference, Comparator<Anime> comparator, String prompt, String difficulty, String type) throws ConnectionError
      Algorithm for generating question based on difficulty Difficulty is based on the positionalDifference of the list For example if we have a list of 100 anime listed by rank We pick a random number then by random chance move forward/backward by positionalDifference% of the list The two anime will then be selected for making question object
      Parameters:
      positionalDifference - The positional difference of the anime on the list
      comparator - The comparator for Animes
      prompt - The question's prompt
      difficulty - The difficulty of the question
      type - The type of the question
      Returns:
      Question The Question object
      Throws:
      ConnectionError

    • generateAnimeImagePath

      public String generateAnimeImagePath(Anime inAnime)
      Downloads the image of the anime if it does not exist and returns the absolute path to the image.
      Parameters:
      inAnime - The Anime to download the image for
      Returns:
      String The absolute path of the image
